title: Your Account is in the Process of Transferring
body:
i cant sign in with my main account for some reason, it says "Your Account is in the Process of Transferring. Please try again in a few menutes. If the issues persists contact Player Support."
plzzzz help i need this account so bad.

replies.body: A transfer may not be immediate, but it should go through in a bit.  If it's still an issue, though, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our account team can see if it got stuck somewhere.  We'll budge it through!
